participant_1.background:
I need a home that has a fenced in yard so that my dog can run and play.
I'm not much of a social media person, because I like to focus on my work and my hobbies.
i am allergic to shellfish.
My time is my most valuable possession.
I took a spin in my Toyota Land Cruiser before heading to my favorite dance club to celebrate my birthday.

participant_2.background:
I wish my spouse could work less so we could spend more time together.
i play the drums.
i need extra iron in my diet.
The most valued material possession I have is my teddy bear from childhood
but , i feel lost and far away from who i truly am.

content.text: What did you do for your birthday?
I went dancing at my favorite club and played the drums at my local music venue.
That sounds really fun! I wish I could dance.
You should go take some lessons! It's really fun and a great way to stay active.
I might! I don't have much time to do hobbies these days.
I know what you mean. I wish I had more time to play the drums too.
What kind of music do you play?
I play a lot of different styles, but my favorite is rock.
Cool! I love rock music too.
Maybe we can jam together sometime!
Great! I'll send you a message later.
